entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
